thread.title: GOP presidential hopeful Trump to hold rally in Richmond
thread.title_full: GOP presidential hopeful Trump to hold rally in Richmond

title: GOP presidential hopeful Trump to hold rally in Richmond
text:
GOP presidential front-runner Donald Trump to hold campaign rally in Richmond 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 10/14/15 3:06 am EDT - Updated: 10/14/15 3:06 am EDT 
RICHMOND, Virginia â€” Republican presidential front-runner Donald Trump is heading to Virginia. 
Trump is holding a campaign rally at the Richmond International Raceway on Wednesday. The event will begin at 7 p.m. 
Trump was supposed to host a rally in Virginia Beach earlier this month but canceled the event after Gov. Terry McAuliffe declared a state of emergency due to Hurricane Joaquin. 
Trump said in a statement that 10,000 people were expected to attend that event. 
Trump is the second GOP presidential candidate to visit Richmond this month. Ohio Gov. John Kasich held a town hall meeting at the University of Richmond last week.
